script:
1.4
Chips, optimized for Mödys CapShips by ***M.o.D.***
http://l-i4xx.xe.cx/
2.029
This mod allows the Server admin to choose things for his server :)
Pls keep in mind what u're doing.
Pls make sure that u're using Mödys Capships MP >= v.2.025
Have Fun =)
